summary: I am a passionate full-stack developer with 4+ years of experience creating and maintaining high-quality web applications. I have strong expertise in modern frameworks (Angular, React, Vue) and languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, C#, PHP). I also have hands-on experience developing RESTful APIs and implementing microservices architectures. Having worked in Agile/Scrum environments, I thrive in collaborative teams and am committed to continuous learning to stay at the forefront of technology.

experience.description: Managed both front-end and back-end systems. Deployed mobile apps to multiple platforms (iOS, Android, Huawei).
Program Analyst (2 year) Managed database integration and API development. Enhanced municipal systems for better user experience.
Developed interoperable systems to facilitate seamless integration with public and private institutions.

projects.title: Soy SPS+ App
projects.description: Developed a highly interactive app for San Pedro Sula, Honduras using React Native Expo.

projects.title: Ackleaners Control Software
projects.description: Business management platform developed with React and Firebase.

projects.title: Coffee Bonus App
projects.description: Developed a React Native app with Expo to validate beneficiary identities using base64 images from the national registry. The system also supports assigning the bonus to a third party. ﻿

projects.title: Maintenance of sanpedrosula.hn
projects.description: Ongoing maintenance using NestJS for APIs and JavaScript for clients.

projects.title: Immobilizer map
projects.description: A web page that receives data of the location of all the immobilizers that are active and paid off around the city

projects.title: TeleHuertos
projects.description: A webpage that displays a schedule and allows users to create video conference rooms for educational sessions on home food cultivation.

projects.title: SIN RNP
projects.description: The SIN RNP (National Registry Identification System) is a centralized platform for managing identity records and civil registration. I developed its second version, enhancing security, scalability, and performance.
